column2: I can pick up things that others have trouble picking up. Even some of the adults seem to have trouble!
I'm unusually strong for my age.
I enjoy running and exercising and best of all, I feel great!
I'm pretty fit for my age.
Your ward seems to be in good shape, taking time out to exercise or go for a run.
You seem to struggle to pick up things that others around you pick up with ease, or at least little effort.
Maybe it is because I'm weak?
You have noticed that your ward is weaker than the other kids their age.
This decision gives a King the ability to form an Empire-tier title, so you may swear fealty to them.

A player has asked to swear fealty, but is a King themselves. If you wish to take them as a vassal, you must have an Empire-tier title. Accepting won't make them a vassal, but will give you a high enough title to accept them.
The union would be in my interest!
No, I will not accept them as a vassal!
